entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
